pr_title: Add descriptions to get propagated into quarkus-universe-bom json

timeline.message: Add descriptions to get propagated into quarkus-universe-bom json

timeline.bodyText: @rsvoboda isn't GraphQL a different approach than REST?
timeline.author: michalszynkiewicz
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -12,6 +12,7 @@
 
     <artifactId>quarkus-vertx-graphql</artifactId>
     <name>Quarkus - Quarkus - Vert.x GraphQL - Runtime</name>
+    <description>Query REST services using GraphQL</description>

replies.bodyText: yeah, Query the API using GraphQL would be better I guess, I will create followup PR
replies.author: rsvoboda

PR is here: #9814
